sentences: Hän on vapaa päästämään sinut sisään.
Lapset saavat olla vapaana koulun jälkeen.
context: The Finnish word 'vapaa' is an adjective that means free or available. It can describe someone who has no obligations (free time), something that is not restricted (open access), or someone/something that has been liberated from constraints. The word changes form depending on the case and number - for example, 'vapaana' is inessive case meaning 'in a free state', while 'vapaa' can be singular nominative or plural nominative.
